post_title: Wine Tasting to Inspire Curiosity in Teams
primary_kit_of the experience: One (1) 750mL bottle of Chateau Montelena chardonnay and one (1) 750mL bottle of Chateau Montelena Napa Valley cabernet Chateau Montelena 'Curiosity' Kit
optional_kit_of the experience: One (1) 500mL bottle of Ghia (orange, grape, ginger apertif) and one (1) 750mL bottle of rhubarb and orange-infused non-alcoholic Aperol. Non-Alcoholic 'Curiosity' Kit
content of experience: In 1972, Jim Barrett bought a crumbling estate in Napa Valley. He knew little about wine. But he knew how to hire curious people and give them space to innovate. Four years later, Chateau Montelena produced the world's #1 rated wine – starting a 40+ year run of producing winning wines. Your team will taste amazing wines while exploring lessons from the birth of America's wine industry. You will learn why “curiosity” is the core of the winery's culture – and how curiosity is sustained in an industry known for tradition.it belongs to cateory of Happy Hour, Wine Tastingwith attributes of Form a United Team: Creating a united team allows you to work together while supporting each other as you work to achieve your common goals. post_title: Learn Authentic Communication with Award-Winning Poet IN-Q
content of experience: Harvard Business Review states, “Teams should make authenticity a core value from the start.” When employees introduce their authentic selves, “Both they and their employer perform better.” Award-winning poet and song writer IN-Q joins you live. For the first ten (10) minutes, IN-Q performs a piece of work live -- and your team becomes accustomed to 'spoken word art' or 'slam poetry' as a medium for story-telling. Then, IN-Q will share a prompt and your team will practice their own story-telling. A February 2021 Wall Street Journal front-page article praised this Teamraderie experience for emblematic of how modern managers are adapting their style for a new era of work. The WSJ story quotes a Dell Technologies executive who used the experience to create "a deeper sense of trust between colleagues." This experience will help your team form deep connections and trust – fast.it belongs to cateory of Notable hostwith attributes of Boost Energy and Motivation: Beat the midday slump with this pick-me-up experience to boost energy, motivation, and productivity on your team. content of experience:
When it comes to having extraordinary health and living our best life there is usually one key element overlooked: Sleep.

Through science and stories, your team will learn tools to sleep better which can be a catalyst for productivity, innovation, personal growth, and happiness. By unlocking the power of sleep we can generate more energy to contribute more, perform better, and make a bigger difference.

In this Teamraderie experience, a certified Sleep Science Academy coach will share insights about how to combat the biggest detractors to sleep. Through diagnostic assessments, discussions, and group exercises, you will learn how to get better quality sleep consistently and thrive at work and in life. Your team will discover essential techniques and tools to fall asleep faster, rest deeper, and wake refreshed.
